title: Losing It for Love
description: Ever convinced yourself that you would probably meet Mr. Right if only you could just get rid of those extra 20 pounds? What about the bump in your nose or the chin you were born with- is that all that’s keeping you from living yourromantic dreams?In this collection you’ll meet lots of less-than-confident ladies who’ve gottheir love lives tangled up in their unusual features and extra weight, and get the skinny on what happens one they start losing it... for love.Learn more at TruLOVEstories.com
author: Barbara Weller
